message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on text mining and retrieval tasks. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also likely as the paper discusses generative text models and their applications in text classification and retrieval. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper proposes the use of machine learning methods for text mining. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is relevant as the paper proposes the use of sparse computation using inverted indices for efficient inference on probabilistic models. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of probabilistic models and machine learning methods for text mining.
